body: I wanted to wait until I get to give `Function` a nicer API that doesn't require touching the `next_functions` member, i.e. until you can really write `grad_fn->setOutputTo` or something similar.
body_html: I wanted to wait until I get to give Function a nicer API that doesn't require touching the next_functions member, i.e. until you can really write grad_fn->setOutputTo or something similar.
